headline: Is It Time To Reassess Arch Capital Group (ACGL) After Strong Multi‑Year Share Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Arch Capital Group is still sensibly priced at around US$96.04, you are not alone, many investors are asking the same question. The stock has recent returns of 3.3% over 7 days, 0.1% over 30 days, 2.3% year to date, 3.2% over 1 year and 64.9% over 3 years, with a 5 year return of 198.8% that may catch the eye of long term holders. Recent coverage around the stock has focused on its role as a large insurance and reinsurance provider. Investors are looking at how...
